We are thrilled to announce that Intuit India is expanding its Talent Acquisition capabilities and is looking for top-notch Tech Recruiters and Sourcers to join our team! These positions will be staffed via Manpower, a leading RPO provider, whom we're partnering with to help us find the best talent. If you are looking for a new challenge and want to be part of a dynamic team, we would love to hear from you! Reach out to Paulami Chakraborty to learn more about this exciting opportunity. Let's raise the bar together!
